name: Atomix (itch) (Bardon)
description:
Do you want a challenge for your brain? This is a puzzle-game from 1990 by Thalion, it was released for C64, Amiga, Atari ST and MS-DOS. I have converted the first ten level of the C64-Version for Windows PC. 

In this game you must build moleculars like shown on the left of the screen. You select an Atom with space-bar and move it with the Cursor keys. But if you move an Atom it moves so long until it hit another tile or the wall. So you must wait, you need a real strategy.

In this Version is no time-limit, you have endless time to think. 

There is also great Music by Boris Grabule.
